name: careerSkills
desc: A list of key skills needed for Technology careers.

careerSkills.name: Software Developer
careerSkills.description: Software Engineers are responsible for developing, designing, testing, writing, modifying, and debugging software based off specific requirements.

careerSkills.name: Web Developer
careerSkills.description: Web Developers create web sites by working closely with clients to develop and implement a website according to their vision. Responsibilities include debugging applications, creating applications, writing code, working with graphic designers to develop the layout, working with graphics, video, and audio, and monitoring traffic to the site.

careerSkills.name: Scrum Master
careerSkills.description: The Scrum Master (or Agile Coach) is responsible for increasing productivity amongst the scrum team by managing the process to select and split up project requirements into Sprints, and ensuring the right people are working on the right tasks, and work will be completed in the expected time frame.

careerSkills.name: Data Scientist
careerSkills.description: A Data Scientist analyzes and interprets complex data, to glean insights and help with decision-making.

careerSkills.name: Mobile App Developer
careerSkills.description: A Mobile App Developer creates application software for smart phones and mobile devices.
